page.title: 06WORKING IN & AROUND AMPNEY
page.content: The local builders employ 4 men, the pubs employ over 30 part-time staff. The shop has 2 part-timers. The farmers and land owners employ more than 14 men. The school employs 6 people. NICC Ltd in {Ampney Crucis} employ 6 people who live out of the area, and a cleaner and a grass cutter from the village. There is always plenty of part-time gardening work available. Some residents have to pay Â£5 an hour to their jobbing gardners. Most people's place of work is either{ {Swindon}or{Cirencester.}One man goes daily to{London}and another to{ {Worcester.}Many of the men are employed as managers, directors and consultants in electronics and insurance. There are three solicitors, a vet, a roadman, a writer, a bank manager and an architect in this area.
